TunableList.name: INITIAL_NARRATIVES
TunableList.description: The initial set of narratives to set for a player. These narratives will be set for a player if they are neither set nor already completed.

Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_ALARM_TIME
Tunable.description: The frequency that we will create or destroy objects in the layer. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.

Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_TO_DESTROY
Tunable.description: The number of objects to destroy at a time when destroying a layer. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.

Tunable.name: LAYER_OBJECTS_TO_LOAD
Tunable.description: The number of objects to load at a time when loading a layer. Please consult a GPE before changing this value as it will impact performance.

Tunable.name: TIME_SLICE_SECONDS
Tunable.description: The maximum alloted time for sending narrative loots to all sim infos.
